mapper.select: SELECT count( 1 ) AS TOTAL, sum( ACTUAL_PAYMENT ) AS MONEY FROM STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_ORDER_REFUND sor LEFT JOIN STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_ORDER_INFO soi ON sor.ORDER_ID = soi.ORDER_ID WHERE to_char( SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm' ) = to_char( APPLY_TIME, 'yyyy-mm' ) AND sor.IS_DELETE = 1 AND sor.REFUND_STATE = 0

SELECT sor.ID, sor.ORDER_ID, sor.APPLY_TIME, soi.ACTUAL_PAYMENT, sor.REFUND_STATE, sbc.OPENING_BANK, sbc.CARD_NUMBER, sbc.OPEN_ACCOUND_NAME, soi.BUYING_USER_ID, sor.REASON FROM STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_ORDER_REFUND sor LEFT JOIN STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_ORDER_INFO soi ON sor.ORDER_ID = soi.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_BANK_CARD sbc ON soi.BUYING_USER_ID = sbc.USER_ID WHERE sor.IS_DELETE = 1 AND sor.ID = #{ID}
select OPEN_ACCOUND_NAME ,CARD_NUMBER , OPENING_BANK, CARD_TYPE from STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_BANK_CARD where IS_DELETE = 1 and USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
mapper.update: update STARCLOUDPORTAL.SCE_BANK_CARD set IS_DELETE = 0 where USER_ID = #{USER_ID} and IS_DELETE = 1
